page.title: 17PLANTLIFE IN BURRA
page.content: SOME OF THE MOST COMMON PLANTS IN BURRA ARE DANDILIONS,DAISYS,BUTTER CUPS AND BIRDS FOOT TREFOIL.MOST OF THE PLANTS HERE IN BURRA ARE VERY SMALL BECAUSE OF THE WEATHER AND THE SHEEP EAT THEM BEFORE THEY COME TO ANY SIZE.THE BIGGEST COMMON PLANT IN BURRA I WOULD THINK IS THE WATER IRIS WHICH GROWS IN MARSH LAND.THE BIRDS FOOT TREFOIL IS SOMETIMES CALLED THE BANANA FLOWER BECAUSE THE PETALS LOOKS LIKE A BANANA.WILD THYME IS A VERY SMALL PLANT WHICH GROWS CLOSE TO THE GROUND. IN SUMMER IT GROWS PINK FLOWERS.THE THRIFT GROWS NEAR THE SEA AND IT IS ALSO CALLED THE SEA PINK.IT IS A LIGHT PINK FLOWER AND IT IS MADE UP OF LOTS OF TINY FLOWERS EACH WITH FOUR PETALS. LADYS SMOCK IS A PINK FLOWER ALSO CALLED THE CUCKOO FLOWER.
